product_name: White Sierra Safari Shorts - Men's - Special Buy
long_description: Get ready for your next big trip with the quick-drying, sun-protective White Sierra Safari Shorts. Ripstop nylon fabric dries fast and provides UPF sun protection. Hand pockets; rip-and-stick back pockets; rip-and-stick thigh pockets. Gusseted crotch allows unrestricted range of motion. Side elastic and an attached belt ensure a good fit. Special buy.
short_description: Get ready for your next big trip with the quick-drying, sun-protective White Sierra Safari Shorts.
